titles.title: A bill to require the Comptroller General of the United States to conduct a study on ways to increase reporting of missing Indians and the effects of substance abuse, including the use of methamphetamine, on violent crime in Tribal communities, and for other purposes.
FIND Act

Finding and Investigating Native Disappearance Act

FIND Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
